titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 434) to authorize a new trade and investment policy for sub-Sahara Africa.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-236, by Mr. Reynolds.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 88.

action.text: Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 434 with 1 hour and 30 minutes of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. Specified amendments are in order.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 250.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 263 - 141 (Roll no. 306).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/16/1999--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (modified closed) for the consideration of H.R. 434 (sub-Saharan Africa trade and development).
